scripts.remote-create-image: dotenv cross-var docker build -f arm.Dockerfile -t eux86/gemini-discord-bot .
scripts.remote-stop-and-remove-container: dotenv cross-var docker stop gemini-bot || true && docker rm gemini-bot || true
scripts.remote-run-container: dotenv -- cross-var docker run -d --name gemini-bot -e BOT_TOKEN=%BOT_TOKEN% eux86/gemini-discord-bot
scripts.deploy: dotenv cross-var echo Deploying to:%DOCKER_HOST% && npm run remote-create-image && npm run remote-stop-and-remove-container && npm run remote-run-container
